entities

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Coin, Enemy, Player, PowerUp, Projectile

    public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    The Entity class represents an entity inside with a movement speed, location, and hitbox. The entity is drawn using the Processing library. It detects collisions between other entities and allows the entity to act.
    Author:
    nathangu

              double h,

              processing.core.PImage image)
        Creates a new instance of Entity
        Parameters:
        x - X-coordinate
        y - Y-coordinate
        w - Width of the hitbox
        h - Height of the hitbox
        circle - If the hitbox is a circle
        image - Image of the entity
